entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 06:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
